description.@en: Blitzballers have a reputation to uphold. That reputation is oftentimes foisted upon others by constantly roaring and pumping their fist from the thrill of violence, but such is the life of these dunderheads.

effect.@en: You must always leave one hand free. This means you cannot wield 2 one-handed weapons, a two-handed weapon or a weapon with shield. Otherwise, you cannot use any of your Traits or Talents conferred by this Profession.
